alert.note: Alert for Aroostook (Maine) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 12 at 6:01PM EDT until July 12 at 7:00PM EDT by NWS Caribou
info.description: The National Weather Service in Caribou Maine has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northwestern Aroostook County in northern Maine... * Until 700 PM EDT. * At 600 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Nine-mile Bridge, or 10 miles east of Lac Frontiere, moving northeast at 50 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor hail damage to vehicles is possible. Expect wind damage to trees and power lines. * Locations impacted include... Allagash, Deboullie Mountain, Fish River Lake, Nine-mile Bridge, Allagash Township, Dickey, Round Pond and Saint Francis. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
